attributes.contentHtml:
I saw what I did and I'm very sorry for the way I acted towards you, for fishing members and all of that, I really am sorry for what I did, and my server "Affinity" We want our server to be very great and we don't want any reports at all and I want to let you know I'm sorry for wasting your time, sorry for responding late towards you, but that's all I have to say, and also I didn't block you, I didn't do anything.. I had kicked you from my server and you left MeleeCraft and I couldn't contact you because you weren't friends with me.. Also, I wanted to invite members and let players know that I was going to release my server very soon, and you were friends with the Owner on MeleeCraft.. so I thought it was okay for you to see it.. Also I was keeping a normal conversation but I was in a rush because I had to go do something..

So please, if you're reading this.. please delete it and I promise we won't have any issues or anything.

attributes.title: Affinity | Minecraft Server | Immature owners and fishing for members
